scripts.install:workspaces: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared-prisma && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd shared-prisma && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
